attributes.action: Help Ringo Starr (Richard Starkey) get his Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello Mr.Prime Minister,
    I like to see if you can get Ringo Starr knighted by the Queen.  He's a good guy, done a lot to make people happy and he is loveable and never say anything bad about anyone.  
    Thank you for the years of running England and England is a better country since you been a prime minister.  Will miss you.  Any chance of you running for US President?   Just a wild thought.
Have a Happy New Year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
